post.author: Foebane
post.body: I have Prey on my system, but recently installed the 1.1 patch, hoping I woudn't need the CD, but it's still asking for it. Is there a version of the NoCD patch for 1.1 at all? Or any version?

post.author: Regulator
post.body:
Foebane wrote:
I have Prey on my system, but recently installed the 1.1 patch, hoping I woudn't need the CD, but it's still asking for it. Is there a version of the NoCD patch for 1.1 at all? Or any version?

yup

post.author: Burrito
post.body: I'm sorry pal, but topics like that can't be discussed at D3W.
